resources.string: University of Washington Tacoma CSS Program Logo

CSS Compass was designed with the intention of helping both incoming and current CSS students reach their goals. The development team sought to compile useful resources that they felt aided their own journey, so that new students would have a launchpad for becoming successful students/programmers.
